ccg-setinfo.name: Infinite Diversity
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: A Private Little War
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Honor, Medical, Science and Integrity>32 or Engineer, Security, Treachery and Strength>32, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped and your opponent may download an equipment.

card.name: Dark Page
card.text: Choose a personnel who has Anthropology or Exobiology to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: In Development
card.text: For each headquarters you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel who has a cost of 2 or less. All your other personnel who have a cost of 2 or less are stopped.

card.name: Inhumane Interrogation
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may destroy an event in your core to prevent this.

card.name: Mark of Gideon
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, return that personnel to his or her owner's hand, then your opponent chooses a second personnel to return to his or her owner's hand. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to return to his or her owner's hand.

card.name: Pillage and Plunder
card.text: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.) Choose a personnel who has Archaeology or Treachery to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Setting the Stage
card.text: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: The Clown: Go Away
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the start of each of your turns, if you command no personnel or ships at this mission, remove this dilemma from the game. When personnel begin a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be returned to its ownerâ€™s hand.

card.name: The First Duty
card.text: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.) Choose a personnel who has Honor or Law to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

card.name: Hypospray
card.text: When your personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel and your Medical personnel present to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Persistent Strike
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - If this is a non- {Voy} ship, ignore its game text.

card.name: Product Placement
card.text: Discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to spend two additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

card.name: Slightly Awkward
card.text: Q. Temporal. Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to choose one: draw an extra dilemma; or, spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: Transport Crash Survivor
card.text: 16 different skills, and Cunning>32 When a player's personnel begin a mission attempt at a mission worth 30 or more points with five or less personnel, the player to the left of that player may draw six extra dilemmas and spend six extra on dilemmas.

card.name: Automated Server
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Exobiology {SD}Transporters Waiter. While you command three {fer} personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Acquisition, and becomes {fer}.

card.name: Doran
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Treachery While you command three {car} personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Archaeology, and becomes {car}.

card.name: Garren
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming {SD}Science While you command three {rom} personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Engineer, and becomes {rom}.

card.name: K'wov
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Navigation {SD}Security While you command three {kli} personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Leadership, and becomes {kli}.

card.name: Sumek
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical While you command three {fed} personnel, this personnel gains Biology and Officer, and becomes {fed}.

card.name: Olarra
card.text: While your {na} Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains {Stf}. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.
